Teleportation: Develop a technology that allows people to instantly transport themselves from one place to another, bypassing the need for planes. This could be achieved through the use of quantum entanglement or other advanced physics principles.
Space Travel: Build a spacecraft that can carry passengers to other continents. This would require significant advancements in space technology and could take several years to develop.

Maglev Train: Create a high-speed magnetic levitation train that can travel long distances and cross oceans. This would require significant infrastructure development and could take several years to build.
Underwater Tunnel: Build an underwater tunnel that connects the continents. This would require significant engineering and construction expertise and could take several years to complete.

Hyperloop: Develop a high-speed transportation system that uses vacuum-sealed tubes to transport passengers at extremely high speeds. This would require significant investment in technology and infrastructure and could take several years to develop.
